text: Arelis Uribe (born Santiago de Chile, 1987) is a Chilean journalist, writer and communication expert. She worked for the presidential campaign of Beatriz Sánchez in the 2017 national election. As a writer, she is best known for her debut collection of short stories Quiltras. In 2016 she won the Santiago en 100 palabras Award for her story "Lionel".Bio ==References== Category:Chilean writers Category:1987 births Category:Living people es:Arelis Uribe
title: Arelis Uribe
